title: 29. Tiberius and Religion
description: Tiberius’ religious policy, examining imperial cult, divine honours, and the suppression of foreign practices.

questions.question: What evidence suggests worship of Tiberius was tolerated in Rome?
options: Coins depicting Tiberius as a god

options: One temple in Smyrna to himself and the genius of the Senate

questions.question: In which year was the Smyrna temple permitted?

options: As an affront to the dignity of his position
